casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthony Jerome JACKSON. No. 123P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of October 2006 by Defendant for Relief from prior order and reinstatement of Motion for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of November 2006."
